document.full_text: the knicks' win over the pacers, on carmelo anthony's shot with 4.9 seconds left, improved their record to 42-38. with one more win, they will clinch the eastern conference's sixth seed.
document.title: knicks 110, pacers 109: knicks are assured a winning season after anthony's key shot and a block
lines_and_colors: the knicks' win over the pacers, on carmelo anthony's shot with 4.9 seconds left, improved their record to 42-38. with one more win, they will clinch the eastern conference's sixth seed.
